name: The Family Plan 2
description: The Family Plan 2 is a 2025 action-comedy sequel where suburban dad and former operative Dan Morgan (Mark Wahlberg) takes his family on a Christmas vacation to London, which quickly turns into a fight for survival when a figure from his past reappears

name: One Battle After Another
description: The story follows a washed-up revolutionary, Bob (Leonardo DiCaprio), who must reunite with his former revolutionary group to find his daughter after their nemesis, a corrupt military officer (Sean Penn), resurfaces and she goes missing.

name: Highest 2 Lowest
description: Highest 2 Lowest is a 2025 Spike Lee crime thriller starring Denzel Washington about a music mogul who is the target of a ransom plot, but the kidnapper mistakenly takes the son of his driver instead of his own son.

name: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind who goes by 'The Professor' plans the biggest heist in recorded history.

name: The Crown
description: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

name: Squid Game
description: Hundreds of cash-strapped contestants accept an invitation to compete in children's games for a tempting prize, but the stakes are deadly.

name: Queen of Tears
description: A gripping tale of love, loss, and resilience set against the backdrop of a war-torn nation.
